pullrequest.title: adding direction indicator to visual markers for stationkeeping and wayfinding

content.raw: Also, very minor, but I was using multiples of 7 for markers because I was doing a lot of experimenting and wanted to avoid collisions, but now that it’s final I changed to multiples of 10000 so its easier to correlate related marker ids.
content.html: Also, very minor, but I was using multiples of 7 for markers because I was doing a lot of experimenting and wanted to avoid collisions, but now that it’s final I changed to multiples of 10000 so its easier to correlate related marker ids.
